table.name: vtiger_hotelarrivals
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_hotelarrivals` ( `hotelarrivalsid` int(19) NOT NULL, `name` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `hotelarrivalsno` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `date_in` date DEFAULT NULL, `date_out` date DEFAULT NULL, `rooms` int(5) DEFAULT NULL, `roomnights` int(5) DEFAULT NULL, `pax` int(5) DEFAULT NULL, `price` decimal(16,8) DEFAULT NULL, `breakfast_box` int(5) DEFAULT NULL, `tags` varchar(1) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`hotelarrivalsid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_hotelarrivalscf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_hotelarrivalscf` ( `hotelarrivalsid` int(19) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`hotelarrivalsid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
